special_abilities.name: Insanity.
descriptions: Droki has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Narrak is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (Save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks) Narrak has two 2nd-level spell slots, which he regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following Warlock spells:>>>

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, friends, poison spray
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, friends, poison spray

descriptions: 1st level: armor of Agathys, charm person, hex
2nd level: hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
descriptions: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Armor of Shadows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: Narrak casts mage armor on himself

actions.name: Shortsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: One with Shadows.
descriptions: While he is in a dim light or darkness, Narrak can become invisible. He remains so until he moves or takes an action or reaction.
